text: Burn Burn is the seventh studio album by Canadian rock band Our Lady Peace. It was released on July 21, 2009. The producer of the album was lead singer Raine Maida. The peaked at #3 on the Canadian Albums Chart and also peaked at #41 on the U.S. Billboard 200. == Singles from Burn Burn == *2009 - "All You Did Was Save My Life" *2009 - "The End is Where We Begin" *2010 - "Dreamland" Category:2009 albums Category:Our Lady Peace albums
title: Burn Burn (album)
